db_read_sql_select: SELECT d.detail_id, h.header_id,h.batch_id,h.claim_number,h.date_of_injury, d.datetime_received,d.image_name,d.image_type FROM txm_preauth_staging.preauth_letters_header h JOIN txm_preauth_staging.preauth_letters_detail d ON h.header_id = d.header_id WHERE h.batch_id = <INPUT_BATCH_ID>
SELECT h.notes_file_header_id FROM txm_preauth_staging.preauth_notes_file_header h WHERE h.batch_id = <INPUT_BATCH_ID>
